title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.101 - Expired cost
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.101 - Expired cost

State Regulations

An expenditure from which no further benefit is
anticipated; an expense; a cost absorbed over the period during which benefits
were enjoyed or a loss incurred. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.101

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
